attributes.additional_details: If supermarkets can have so many people shop in there store why cant Doctors have people going in to the surgery for there appointments. Dentist and hairdressers etc are open now. Surely its time surgery's were back open now. its not like there wont be safety measures put in place.
attributes.background: The Doctors need to be open now. Its not right that there only doing appointments over the phone. People want to see there Doctors in person.

rejection.details:
Decisions about how NHS services are provided during the Covid-19 outbreak is a matter for the NHS and individual practices, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can find out how to access NHS services, including GPs, here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/social-distancing/using-the-nhs-and-other-health-services/
